name: Grimlock
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

special_abilities.name: Blind Senses.
descriptions: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell.
descriptions: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage.
descriptions: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Spiked Bone Club.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
